actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Crooked River Project Act of August 6, 1956, as amended.

summary.text: Authorizes the additional functions of recreation, fish and wildlife enhancement, and municipal and industrial water supply at the Prineville Reservoir, Oregon. Provides for the reassignment of storage space associated with the Prineville Reservoir and the reallocation of project costs associated with such reassignment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Crooked River Project Act of August 6, 1956, as amended.
